World.Name: Lincoln
World.Entry:
December, 1050: Lincoln: Hi Kendall Kendall: Hi Lincoln! Mum sent me to tell you to do some chores around the farm instead of just relaxing all the time. If you want though, we could sneak off and go play instead! Lincoln: I'll think on it - you always were a bad influence on me Kendall: Hey - that's what sisters are for!
December, 1050: Lincoln does nothing all month
